# Origin {#origin}

Coracoid process of [Scapula]({{< var ref-scapula-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion {#insertion}

Middle 1/3 of [Humerus]({{< var ref-humerus-bone.path >}}) (in line with crest of lesser tubercle) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Nerve
[Musculocutaneous N.]({{< var ref-musculocutaneous-nerve.path >}}) ([C5]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c5 >}}), [C6]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c6 >}}), [C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action {#action}

**GHJ**: Flexion, Adduction, Internal rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
